## Contributor Checklist âœ…

<!-- Please review and check off the following items before submitting your PR. -->

- [ ] I based my branch on **develop** and all commits are rebased (no merge commits).
- [ ] I tested my changes in both **DEBUG** and **RELEASE** builds.
- [ ] I followed existing architectural patterns and coding conventions.
- [ ] If my PR modifies ***.cs files***, I reviewed <u>all warnings related to my changes and resolved them</u>.
- [ ] Async code correctly marshals UI interactions to the UI thread.
- [ ] If my PR modifies **JavaScript**, I ran `eslint` (v10+) and <u>fixed any reported warnings or errors</u>.
- [ ] My changes do not use OS-specific APIs unless implemented through the PlatformServices abstraction.
